title: Funky Lloyd Wright
content:
What a great board! This is the one of the first typefaces designed by an old print designer who's new to type design. Inspired in an odd way by FLW. Crit away!   
 ![funky-lloyd-wright](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414110703im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/your_image.gif)
author: walkman

comments.content:
oops. screwed up the code (newbie).   
Let's try this:   
 ![funky-lloyd-wright](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414110703im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1983.gif)
lloyd wrong is interesting. if you are a big fan of wright, check out "midway" fron isis imaging, I think precision type distributes it.
